articles.title: Revolution make hiring of coach Marko Mitrović official

articles.title: ‘It was obvious’: Lucas Giolito not surprised Red Sox didn’t extend him qualifying offer
articles.description:
The Red Sox could've given Giolito a one-year, $22.05 million qualifying offer, which could've given Boston draft compensation if the pitcher leaves in free agency.

The post ‘It was obvious’: Lucas Giolito not surprised Red Sox didn’t extend him qualifying offer appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Pavel Zacha scores with 6 seconds left in OT as Bruins beat Senators 3-2 and earn fifth straight victory
articles.description:

articles.title: Patriots owner Robert Kraft named a semifinalist for 2026 Pro Football Hall of Fame Class
articles.description:
